extendedInfo.description: This app, designed for users of Covenant Eyes Internet Accountability, monitors and reports websites visited through the stock browser, Dolphin Browser, and Skyfire Web Browser. In addition, it reports when and for how long other apps were accessed.IMPORTANT! Only Covenant Eyes members can use this app. Learn more and sign up at covenanteyes.com.Our user guide will help you use the app more effectively. View it at covenanteyes.com/android-guideFEATURESâ¢ Monitors all browsing and searching on your deviceâs stock browser, Dolphin Browser, and Skyfire Web Browser, and sends it in a report to a friendâ¢ Reports which apps were used and for how longABOUT INTERNET ACCOUNTABILITYInternet Accountability tracks the websites you visit on your computers, smartphones, and tablets, and sends them in an easy-to-read report to someone you trust.This brings transparency to your Internet use and helps you build trust and fight temptations online.For parents, it means you can have specific conversations about what your kids see and do online.SIGN UP FOR COVENANT EYESAccountability for all your computers, smartphones, and tablets starts at just $8.99/mo. Filtering is also available for computers, iPhoneÂ®, iPod touchÂ®, and iPadÂ®.Learn more and sign up at covenanteyes.com.

reviews.title: Bad upgrade
reviews.comment: I have an HTC one and the app is constantly crashing. Please fix soon!
reviews.author: Van Hubbard

reviews.title: Major improvements to app
reviews.comment: The app now works as advertised-still a shame it doesn\'t monitor specific app usage.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best thing ever
reviews.comment: Title says it all
reviews.author: Joshua Francis

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Love it!
reviews.author: Daniel Owolabi

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: Would be nice if covanent eye put power saving features for andriod into their next updates.
reviews.author: Tony Vaughn

reviews.title: Accountability and openness.
reviews.comment: This is quintessential for those who are fighting temptation and battling porn addiction.
reviews.author: joshua17sc

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Great improvements. Would be great if Chrome was added to the list of approved browsers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of the most important
reviews.comment: FYI, this app is free but the crevice is not so be ware before downloading.  Other than that, i\'ve been using covenant eyes for a while now and I think if you can afford it, this is one of the most important apps developed for Christians or anyone struggling with temptations online.  God bless.
reviews.author: Olani A

reviews.title: The best accountability available for android.
reviews.comment: Small system footprint. Effective monitoring.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Thanks Covenant Eyes for providing this awesome service. Works great, too. Keep up the good work :-)
reviews.author: Zach Burnham

reviews.title: Needs to monitor chrome
reviews.comment: This seriously need to be able to monitor activity on chrome browser
reviews.author: Phil Brangers

reviews.title: Jonathan Benedek
reviews.comment: I use CE on my Desktop, and I love it.  But CE for Android phones could be just as good if it can monitor all the phone\'s activity (all web browsers and app content for apps that use the Internet).
reviews.author: Jonathan Benedek

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: This app does not work with anything but the useless stock browser. What am I paying for if it won\'t work with other browsers. I.e. Firefox.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Current release seems very stable. No problems or force closes. Always thankful for this app!
reviews.author: John Melcon

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: Thanks for fixing the crashes that have plagued the app for some time.
reviews.author: Lee Jackson

reviews.title: Thank You
reviews.comment: Thank you for removing the sign out now option and changing it to sign in as another user.  This greatly helps my accountability.
reviews.author: Matthew Harding

reviews.title: Does Not Record Browsing From \"Incognito\" Mode
reviews.comment: The stock browser on my Galaxy S2 has an \"Incognito\" function.  I tested it against the CE reports and nothing I viewed while browsing this way showed up.  This makes the app almost worthless to have on my phone.
reviews.author: Ryan Warren

reviews.title: Worse than useless - Does not monitor incognito sessions
reviews.comment: When I installed I knew that it was for monitoring the stock browser only so I disabled all other browsers with Smart App Lock.  Then I discovered it does not monitor (stock browser) incognito sessions! What is the point of this app? At least with no software you know you don\'t know, with this app you think you know what your kids are up to but you have no idea hence worse than useless.  Monitor ALL stock browsing for a 4 star rating and all browsers for 5 star. Until then you\'re better off without it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I will give full stars as soon as you make monitoring for google Chrome across the board for all phones. Most default browsers are not good and not everyone wants to use skyfire or dolphin
reviews.author: Matt Giesow

reviews.title: Issues after the latest update...
reviews.comment: After the latest update it constantly crashes... it has never crashed before... please fix this... It seems that a good number of people are having issues.
reviews.author: Roberto Gualan
